name: vinification
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity of producing wine, or the way in which wine is produced: The small-scale farmers sell the grapes that they grow, as they do not have facilities for vinification. Winemakers are now planting new vines and modernizing vinification techniques.
More examplesFewer examplesUntil recently, methods of viticulture and vinification have remained remarkably unchanged.He is a talented winemaker who produces classic wines using modern vinification techniques.When he took over the business, he built a new vinification plant and developed the vineyard.
